---
title: "SGP 1.7-0.0"
date: "April 10th, 2017"
---

```{r include = FALSE}
    library(SGP)

    is_html_output = function() {
        knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to")=="html"
    }

    knitr::opts_chunk$set(
        collapse=TRUE,
        comment="",
        prompt=TRUE,
        fig.dpi=96)

    if (is_html_output()) {
        options(width=1000)
    }
```


This is the 1.7 release of the SGP package posted to CRAN. This [GitHub tagged release](https://github.com/CenterForAssessment/SGP/releases/tag/ceec338)
can be downloaded via:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("CenterForAssessment/SGP", ref="ceec338")
```

To see all the changes in this release check out the [change log](https://sgp.io/news/index.html#sgp-1-7-0-0).


Feel free to drop me a line with any comments, feature requests, or ideas. And give us a shout-out Tweet using the Twitter button in the upper right!
